title: City Street
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What do you see in a city? In the book City Street, students will get to view the sights of the city. They will see people, food, buildings, and more. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details as well as how to locate and classify nouns.
reviewWords: buildings, bus, city, food, people, sidewalk, steps, street, taxi
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
